data.meta_description: St. Peter’s Health is committed to providing patient assistance to our patients to help you work through financial barriers that may arise before or after treatment.
data.text:
St. Peter’s Health is committed to helping our patients work through financial issues that may arise before or after treatment. We are here to help ensure these issues never prevent anyone from seeking care by providing access to Financial Navigators, offering zero-interest payment plans and free or discounted care for those who qualify through our assistance program.

Financial assistance application

If you have concerns about paying your bill, please fill out our online assistance application to see if you qualify.

Online Financial Assistance Application

Print Version of Patient Assistance Application

Financial Navigators

If you have concerns about paying for medical services or would like to receive a paper Financial Assistance application via mail, please contact one of our Financial Navigators at (406) 447-2828. Download the Plain Language Financial Assistance Summary here.

Payment plans

St. Peter’s Health is happy to offer zero-interest payment options even for those who do not qualify for financial assistance. Patients can set up a payment plan through our online payment portal or by contacting one of our Financial Navigators at (406) 447-2828.

Download the Plain Language Financial Assistance Summary
